title: HEPData analysis tool schema
description: A JSON schema for tracking implementations of HEPData analyses in different tools

tool.description: The tool used to implement the analysis

version.description: The version of the tool used to implement the analysis

url_templates.description: Templates for URLs to the main repository and important other pages

main_url.description: The URL template for the main repository. Should contain e.g. a {name} placeholder for the analysis name.

val_url.description: The URL template for the validation page. Should contain e.g. a {name} placeholder for the analysis name.

analyses.description: The analyses implemented in the tool

Analysis.description: An analysis, identified by the INSPIRE ID, implemented at least once in a tool

inspire_id.description: The INSPIRE ID of the analysis

implementations.description: The implementations of the analysis in the tool

signature_type.description: The signature of the analysis, e.g. 'prompt', 'displaced'

pretty_name.description: A pretty name for the analysis

Implementation.description: An implementation of an analysis in a tool, giving the internal name to retrieve information

path.description: The path to the implementation in the tool
